section.name: DataCite
section.definition: A published dataset referenced by a DOI and registered with DataCite. The referenced dataset will contain either the odML file itself or the data the odML is annotating.

property.name: DataDOI
property.definition: A unique Digital object identifier of data. In the current context a URI linking to the published dataset.

property.name: ResourceType
property.definition: A description of the resource. The format is open, but the preferred format is a single term of some detail so that a pair can be formed with the sub-property.Text formats can be free-text OR terms from the CASRAI Publications resource type list. In the odML context the value will mostly be 'Dataset'.

section.name: DataCiteReference
section.definition: A publication the published dataset is referencing.

property.name: RefType
property.definition: refType might be: IsCitedBy, IsSupplementTo, IsReferencedBy, IsPartOf for further valid types see https://schema.datacite.org/meta/kernel-4

property.name: PublicationCitation
property.definition: Full citation of the reference publication

section.name: DataCiteAuthor
section.description: Information about an author as required by DataCite.

property.name: Affiliation
property.definition: Affiliation of the author [Institute, City, Country]

property.name: Id
property.definition: Any Id that is capable of identifying the author e.g. ORCID
